programme.title: Shining SOLO
programme.desc: The men and women step out of TREASURE CASTLE for a special experience Discovering new charms they haven't seen in each other before they grow closer during a follow-up barbecue party. Some are tender others meticulous...A great time for everyone.

programme.title: YG Entertainment Specials
programme.desc: BABYMONSTER released their first mini album [BABYMONS7ER]. The title track 'SHEESH' has been well-received by music fans for its confident lyrics, addictive chorus, and grand hip-hop-based sound.

programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: It is a New Year in the BLACKPINK House! The members prepare sliced rice cake soup per Korean tradition. BLACKPINK also goes to an amusement park and find themselves in the middle of a safari zoo. Rosé and Lisa prepare a surprise visit to support Jisoo's last day as MC of SBS Inkigayo.

programme.title: BLACKPINK House
programme.desc: BLACKPINK members split into two pairs to go on a day adventure. Each member chooses an activity they have always wanted to do. Lisa and Rosé try archery and trampolines, while Jisoo and Jennie try making accessories and rollerskating.

programme.title: YG Entertainment Specials
programme.desc: 'FOREVER’ reinterprets 80s synthpop into a dance pop genre that fits BABYMONSTER’s style. It features a lively sound, dynamic progression, and a hip-hop vibe melting into an addictive chorus, which has been well received.

programme.title: BLACKPINK Diaries
programme.desc: World Tour; Thailand as the first stop; Lisa's daddy; secretly filming Rosé's weird dance practice backstage; bubble wrap; and 7-11 Thai snacks.

programme.title: BLACKPINK Diaries
programme.desc: Jisoo's Gaji; Lisa's street food in Chinatown; Rosé's full banquet room service meal; chipmunk Chaeng; Jisoo's Adidas; and soundcheck.
